review: We approched Dr Sharmila garu on an emergency as my daughter had severe stomach ace. The way she treated and explained the issue to us was an outstanding and complete treatment went on well. Ideally we choose to take 2nd opinion but she her self suggested and took 2nd opinion on behalf of us with known people and suggested us to undergo for surgery. Today we are happy and daughter is back to normal. Thank you so much Dr. Sharmila  garu

*** ******** **** ** *** **** ******* My kids love her and we are so blessed to have her in our life. 
Thank you Dr. Kaza, for being there for us. 
We are forever grateful to you. 
Best Regards , 
M

*** ******** ** ****** ******** ******* **** ********* *** ********** I had to visit Dr. Sharmila on December 12, 2022, for my 4 year old's fever and stomach pain. She even did not do the clinical examination and rather made a diagnosis on her own without listening to symptoms of chronic constipation. She wrote tests and diagnostic examinations of Rs. 5000/- without any conclusive diagnosis. Unfortunately,  my daughter was not well till evening. When I called her, she again insisted to come for an abdominal ultrasound and threatened about so many big big diseases. Finally, I had to visit another doctor *** ********** ***** **** ********** ** *** ******** ***** ** *** **** ********** Now my baby is perfectly fine. I will never recommend Dr. Sharmila to anyone.

The doctor has no respect for other’s time. We had to wait for 1.5h even after taking an appointment. She just closed the door and talked to someone. If you are busy during a certain time slot, don’t take appointments during that time. We had to wait a lot before also, but this time it was just too much. I’d never recommend the doctor to anyone

My 5.5 year old had fever and we visited her as our family doctor was not available.
First thing she is very ARROGANT and do not value time. While we were there she was continuously attending phones and not even she was sorry for that. 
She created a PANIC saying we need to ADMIT and suggested *********** tests.**** *** *** **** ** ******** * ****** ***** ****** She did not even do a normal clinical analysis.
IT WAS A VERY NAD EXPERIENCE FOR US. WE HAD TO VISIT OTHER DOCTOR AGAIN *** ** ********* * **** ***** ********** *** *** ** ********** **** ****** * *****
